name: delivereze
tag_list: courier, community, social, delivery, shipping, shipments, make-money, save-money
overview:
delivereze is the South African social courier service that puts you in touch with a community of couriers.

You can make money by becoming a courier to deliver things that fit in around your life - earn some extra cash by delivering items on your commute or travels. Earn back some of your fuel costs by delivering something on the way.

You can get stuff delivered cheaply by opening it to bids from our community of couriers - you set the price you’re happy to pay and couriers bid how much they’re willing to deliver for - you choose the bid you’re happy with.

It’s completely open - you login with your Facebook or Twitter account so there’s a face behind every profile.
